org.gsma.joyn

Class JoynUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gsma.joyn.JoynUtils

  • public class JoynUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility functions which permit to detect other joyn client installed on a device
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET

    • Method Detail

      • getJoynClients

        public static java.util.List<ResolveInfo> getJoynClients(Context context)
        Returns the list of joyn clients installed on the device. An application is identified as a joyn client by including an intent filter with the ACTION_CLIENT_SETTINGS action in the Manifest.xml of the application.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        Returns:
        List of application info

      • isJoynClientActivated

        public static void isJoynClientActivated(Context context,
                         ResolveInfo appInfo,
                         BroadcastReceiver receiverResult)
        Is a particular joyn client activated. The result is returned asynchronously via a broadcast receiver.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        appInfo - Application info
        receiverResult - Broadcast receiver result

      • loadJoynClientSettings

        public static void loadJoynClientSettings(Context context,
                          ResolveInfo appInfo)
        Load the settings activity of a particular joyn client to enable or disable the client
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        appInfo - Application info
